item.title: Maduro Captured: What Comes Next for Venezuela?
item.description: Maduroâ€™s capture is a significant tactical victory for the United States, the region, and Venezuelans. Whether it leads to long-term strategic gains for the United States and Venezuelans, meaning a return to democracy, will be clear only with time.
